    ConversionTools

    public static class ConversionTools.Static

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String convertDegree2DirectionCode(double degree)
      Converts degree to direction code.

    • Method Detail

      • convertDegree2DirectionCode

        public java.lang.String convertDegree2DirectionCode(double degree)

        Converts degree to direction code.

        Parameters:
        degree - Degree of windData (as received from OpenWeatherMap.org).
        Returns:
        Direction code, e.g., "N", "NE", etc.
        Throws:
        - Degree should be between 0 and 360.

      • convertDegree2DirectionName

        public java.lang.String convertDegree2DirectionName(double degree)

        Converts degree to direction name.

        Parameters:
        degree - Degree of windData (as received from OpenWeatherMap.org).
        Returns:
        Direction name, e.g., "North", "North East", etc.
        Throws:
        - Degree should be between 0 and 360.
